alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Musselshell; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 1:47AM MST until January 12 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. * WHERE...Golden Valley, Judith Gap, Musselshell, and Southern Wheatland. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely be slick. Strong wind gusts could cause blowing snow through Judith Gap, reducing visibility. Wind chills of 15 to 35 below are expected through the period. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be light and scattered today, with widespread snow developing this afternoon and continuing into Friday. Watch for possible freeze up ice jams on rivers and streams, which could lead to minor flooding this weekend.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Musselshell; Southern Wheatland
